short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Execute BUY, SELL, SHORT, and COVER orders manually as per your discretion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Algomojo Signal Generator Chrome Extension serves as a robust tool crafted for traders and investors, enabling manual placement of buy, sell, short, and cover orders.
